scripts.start: mkdirp db && cross-env PORT=4000 cross-env BASE_PATH=kcal-app node src/index
scripts.deploy: docker run --name Kcal-App-Backend-V1.1 -d -e PORT='8080' -e BASE_PATH='kcal-app' -p 3200:8080 devbysp/kcal-app-backend:1.1
scripts.create-cert: openssl x509 -req -days 1825 -in cert/csr.pem -signkey cert/key.pem -out cert/cert.pem && rm cert/csr.pem
